tag_list: green-tech, clean-tech, solar-energy, start-up, high-tech, green-energy, energy-saving, wind-energy, innovation, middle-east, israel, masdar
overview: Karin Kloosterman is the CEO and founder of Green Prophet, the dominant news website focusing on Middle East markets in green tech. The site features clean tech entrepreneurs and green social projects. For its reputation, Israeli clean technologies are very much a focus on the website, read by about 200,000 people a month.
